group_1.textCenter: Did this play out according to your plans?
Of course, the fainting incidents never@existed...
You spun a web of rumors to set the scene...
The only ones you actually attacked were@Momoko Togame and Ayame Mikuri...
And those "visions" that Konoha Shizumi@saw... That's not what they were.
It was hypnosis. Which you put her under,@in order to get her to lose control...
After all of that, was it worth it? Is this@what you wanted to happen?
It was just a whim of yours, wasn't it?
Well, your whims interfered with the fate of@Kamihama City.
But...that was your real goal, wasn't it?
